ABOUT US

WHO WE ARE
/$
$
/$
/$
$
Welcome to Kava Kula Bar & Lounge,
/$
$
Welcome to our corner of the Kava community! We're John and Jackie Sekula, two individuals who embarked on a transformative journey with Kava in 2021 and never looked back. Our passion for this remarkable root and its profound impact on lives has driven us to share our experiences and knowledge with others. Our journey with Kava began as a curious exploration into alternative wellness practices. Little did we know that it would evolve into a deep-seated love affair with both Kava and the vibrant community surrounding it. From our very first sip, we were captivated by the calming effects and the sense of clarity it provided. But it wasn't just the physical sensations that drew us in. It was the stories of transformation and healing that resonated deeply with us. We witnessed firsthand how Kava has the power to change lives, offering relief from stress, anxiety, and even physical discomfort.
As we delved deeper into the world of Kava, we were struck by its rich cultural heritage and the sense of camaraderie within the community. From traditional ceremonies to modern gatherings, we found ourselves welcomed with open arms, forging connections that would last a lifetime. Driven by our passion and fueled by our own experiences, we felt compelled to share the magic of Kava with others. Whether through educational resources, community events, or simply a warm conversation over a shell of Kava, we strive to spread awareness and appreciation for this incredible root.
Our mission is simple yet profound: to empower individuals to embrace wellness and vitality through the natural wonders of Kava. Join us on this journey of discovery, connection, and transformation. Together, we can unlock the full potential of Kava and create a happier, healthier world for all.
Cheers to a brighter future, fueled by the power of Kava!
Bula,
John and Jackie Sekula
/$
$
$
OUR MISSION
/$
$
/$
/$
$
We exist to bring communities the finest Kava in the world while fostering connectedness, creativity, and service.
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
Kava Kula Team
/$
$
/$
/$
$
At Kava Kula Kava Bar & Lounge, we believe that community is everything. From our relaxing island-inspired atmosphere to our authentic kava offerings, we strive to create a sense of belonging for all our Kava family. Come in and enjoy a cup of kava while listening to live music or admiring the work of local artists displayed throughout the lounge. Our team is committed to providing a unique and memorable experience for every guest, so come and experience the magic of Kava Kula for yourself.
/$
$
$
$
$
$
$
Brad

$
Kava Kula Bar Manager
